description:
## Decoration - Image Editor for Batch Processing

![Screenshot of Decoration](https://www.japplis.com/decoration/images/decoration-screenshot.png)

Decoration is an image editor. Decoration applies effects to your images. 
        You have an extensive set of effects (more than 100) including color border, gradient border, round corners, drop shadow, mirror, blur, reduce noise, tint, mosaic, superpose text, rotate, zoom, crop, button, brightness, contrast, gamma, glow, bend, sharpen, change transparency, kaleidoscope, oil, emboss, bump or edge. 
        Images can be located on your hard disk, on a website, in the clipboard or your can create an empty one. More than 80 examples are included in the software.
        Freemium with 100 free processed images per month then a watermark is applied to the images.
author: Japplis
